title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: Haas Lilienthal House
hours: Tours: Su 11AM-4PM, W and Sa noon-3PM. Tours leave every 20 to 30 minutes and last about 1 hour
price: General admission: $8, Seniors and Children 12 and under: $5
content: This is an 11,500 square foot Queen Anne Victorian, built solely out of redwood in 1886 for William Haas. It has been fully preserved as per its original design. It presently houses the San Francisco Architectural Heritage who offer tours inside the house and around the grounds.
